title: Mailvox: in which she demonstrates that she’s not
author: VD
content_html:
Renee still thinks she’s a feminist:

Equality is just that. I think the legally women should have the exact same rights and responsibilities of a man of the same age.

Thus, Renee isn’t a feminist. Once she reads up on the feminist canon, she’ll understand that. At best, feminism is theoretically dedicated to equality of result; if we actually applied that concept across the board instead of only regarding things where men have an advantage, we’d be shooting old women over the age of 75, throwing millions of women in jail and rejecting an additional 10 percent of girls’ college applications.

At its worst, feminism is simply totalitarianism with a lipsticked face.
